data.title: 21 States, 15 Countries Represented On Limestone University Dean's List & Honor Roll
data.meta_description: Limestone University had a combined 288 students named to either the Dean’s List or the Honor Roll for the spring semester of 2024.
data.text:
Limestone University had a combined 288 students named to either the Dean’s List or the Honor Roll for the spring semester of 2024.

A total of 155 students qualified for the Dean’s List, while 133 made the Honor Roll.

Those students represented 21 different states as well as 15 different countries.

Full-time students (taking a minimum of twelve semester hours) receiving the grade of “A” in all their courses are included on the Dean’s List, while full-time students with a Grade Point Average of at least 3.75 are included on the Honor Roll.

The lists include students from the University’s traditional On-Campus Program as well as Limestone Online.

Including the 340 students who qualified during the previous fall semester, Limestone had a combined 628 students make the Dean’s List or Honor Roll during the 2023-2024 academic year.

A complete directory of students making the two respective lists for spring 2024 can be found below.

Scroll to Honor Roll table
